description:
Makes TaskManagerModel cache all values (values are fetched on
demand). Without this the UI could ask for the same value twice in a
row and get different values, even though the UI was not told the
value changed. This can cause all sorts of problems, in particular if
sorting is enabled it can lead to crashes (std::sort isn't too happy
if values change out from underneath it).

BUG=none
TEST=none
R=yoshiki@chromium.org


Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=177001
